summary: Pejorative words are those used to insult or show disrespect to someone or something. They can express criticism or hostility. These terms might be seen as offensive by some groups but not others. Sometimes, a word can change over time; a word that was once considered pejorative might become acceptable, and vice versa. It's important to be aware of the potential harm these words can cause and use language respectfully.
title: Pejorative
